comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; Win64; x64; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110212 Firefox/4.0b12pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; Win64; x64; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110212 Firefox/4.0b12pre

when the video is loading, video player's control is visible. when the video starts to play, the video control goes away but the "video's time counter" stays on the screen. please see attached image.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. go to the URL provided
2. wait the video to play
3.
Actual Results:  
video is playing with the video time counter visible.

Expected Results:  
the video time counter should not be visible.

if you hover the mouse over the video when it is playing, which will bring up the video controls, and move it away, the video's time counter goes away.

I'm using Flash 10.2.152.26, for what it's worth.
